Name: Have a Bloody Goal
About the game: Kill your enemies in style You hear their screams but you are not afraid, shoot them down to score. Play against hordes of zombies while trying to beat them in a soccer game. Be strategic and collect lots of ammo. So what if there are giant zombies. You still have one goal in mind, win a championship. Play giants against armies of massive zombies that you are still able to take down with your weapons.
